summary: A romantic comedy centered on two young cooks and a female sommelier working in a famous Zurich luxury restaurant.
cast: Unax Ugalde|Nora Tschirner|Giulio Berruti|Herbert Knaup|Elena Irureta|Xenia Tostado|Sabina Schneebeli|Rainer Guldener|Susana Abaitua|Marga Altolaguirre|Ander Vildósola Gala|Enaut Gantxegi|Irie Leon Dje Bi|Pei Feng Ye|Ibán Malo|Daniel Alonso|Eva Nilsen|Lander Otaola|Virginia Goméz|Samuel|Miguel Antelo|Christine Schlüfer|Madeleine Trabilzsch|Klemens Niklaus Trenkle
title: Bon appétit
